title.head: Live photo Assistant
title.pasteConf: ‚ö†Ô∏è Overwrite local storage configuration from clipboard?

tips.imagePrior: Image priority: raw motion > converted > raw
tips.motiontips: Only support JPG synthesis, priority to substitute embed video.
tips.createMotion: Confirm timestamp and video length before create.
tips.cutVideo: Extract image from video at position (s) with ffmpeg.
tips.multiCore: Multi-threaded core is faster, but unstable and not supported by all browsers.
tips.setPixel: Set max pixels, keep original or reset with buttons on the right
tips.apiUrl: to represent file name in url;
tips.reqHeader: Click + to append and apply current http header
tips.uploadtips: The configurations will be saved to Local Storage if clicking button on top-right.
tips.cors: Install userscript to solve CORS issues:
tips.downloadtips: Cloud conversion need pre-upload, marking the file extension in url is recommended.
tips.setCrop: Video will be crop as image
tips.popBoxTitle: FFmpeg raw params were accessible by EDIT COMMAND in dropdown menu of Transcode button.
tips.cutVideoFrom: Click to use the current playing time point as clipping start.
tips.cutVideoTo: Click to use the current playing time point as clipping end.

prompt.scaleNotMatch: ‚ö†Ô∏è  Different aspect ratio between image and video,confirm video scale against image or snapshot image first.
prompt.editCommand: ‚ö†Ô∏èEdit ffmpeg execution params, DO NOT change input file name.
